document_data.name: Mamenchisaurus
document_data.mainbody: '''Mamenchisaurus''' ({{Pronounce|ma|men|chi|SAR|us|refs={{Cite dragon/93/Ay pronunseeAYshun gyd|28}}}}) was a species of [[dinosaur]].
document_data.Description: Mamenchisaurs were sauropods. Their massive body supported what is likely the longest neck of any natural creature found on [[Toril]]. Their neck is a full {{SI|35|ft}} in length. Their neck contains nineteen vertebrae, which were supported by bony connections. This prevented the mamenchisaurus from bending its neck other than their head.
document_data.Combat: When targeted by a predator, mamenchisaurs used their tails as a destructive whip.
document_data.Habitat: Mamenchisaurs were found living in swamps.
document_data.Biology: Mamenchisaurs were herbivores and solitary creatures. Their long neck allowed them to reach the foliage from any tree.
